00025 #ifndef USEREVENTS_H
00026 #define USEREVENTS_H
00027 
00028 #include <wx/intl.h>        // Needed for wxTRANSLATE
00029 
00030 
00031 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00032     #define ATTR(x) 
00033 #else
00034     #define ATTR(x) __attribute__((x))
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 /* Each event will use 5 IDs:
00038    - the panel that shows the prefs for this event
00039    - the 'Core command enabled' checkbox
00040    - the 'Core command' textctrl
00041    - the 'GUI command enabled' checkbox
00042    - the 'GUI command' textctrl
00043 */
00044 #define USEREVENTS_IDS_PER_EVENT    5
00045 
00046 const int USEREVENTS_FIRST_ID   =   11500;  /* Some safe GUI ID to start from */
00047 
00059 #define USEREVENTS_EVENTLIST() \
00060     USEREVENTS_EVENT(DownloadCompleted, wxTRANSLATE("Download completed"), \
00061         USEREVENTS_REPLACE_VAR( \
00062             wxT("FILE"), \
00063             wxTRANSLATE("The full path to the file."), \
00064             ((CPartFile*)object)->GetFullName().GetRaw() ) \
00065         USEREVENTS_REPLACE_VAR( \
00066             wxT("NAME"), \
00067             wxTRANSLATE("The name of the file without path component."), \
00068             ((CPartFile*)object)->GetFileName().GetRaw() ) \
00069         USEREVENTS_REPLACE_VAR( \
00070             wxT("HASH"), \
00071             wxTRANSLATE("The eD2k hash of the file."), \
00072             ((CPartFile*)object)->GetFileHash().Encode() ) \
00073         USEREVENTS_REPLACE_VAR( \
00074             wxT("SIZE"), \
00075             wxTRANSLATE("The size of the file in bytes."), \
00076             (wxString)(CFormat(wxT("%llu")) % ((CPartFile*)object)->GetFileSize()) ) \
00077         USEREVENTS_REPLACE_VAR( \
00078             wxT("DLACTIVETIME"), \
00079             wxTRANSLATE("Cumulative download activity time."), \
00080             CastSecondsToHM(((CPartFile*)object)->GetDlActiveTime()) ) \
00081     ) \
00082     USEREVENTS_EVENT( \
00083         NewChatSession, \
00084         wxTRANSLATE("New chat session started"), \
00085         USEREVENTS_REPLACE_VAR( \
00086             wxT("SENDER"), \
00087             wxTRANSLATE("Message sender."), \
00088             *((wxString*)object) ) \
00089     ) \
00090     USEREVENTS_EVENT( \
00091         OutOfDiskSpace, \
00092         wxTRANSLATE("Out of space"), \
00093         USEREVENTS_REPLACE_VAR( \
00094             wxT("PARTITION"), \
00095             wxTRANSLATE("Disk partition."), \
00096             wxString((wxChar*)object) ) \
00097     ) \
00098     USEREVENTS_EVENT( \
00099         ErrorOnCompletion, \
00100         wxTRANSLATE("Error on completion"), \
00101         USEREVENTS_REPLACE_VAR( \
00102             wxT("FILE"), \
00103             wxTRANSLATE("The full path to the file."), \
00104             ((CPartFile*)object)->GetFullName().GetRaw() ) \
00105     )
00106 
00107 
00108 #define USEREVENTS_EVENT(ID, NAME, VARS)    ID,
00109 
00116 class CUserEvents {
00117     friend class CPreferences;
00118  public:
00120     enum EventType {
00121         USEREVENTS_EVENTLIST()
00122         /* This macro expands to the following list of user event types:
00123            DownloadCompleted, NewChatSession, OutOfDiskSpace, ErrorOnCompletion */
00124     };
00125 
00140     static void     ProcessEvent(enum EventType event, const void* object);
00141 
00145     static unsigned int GetCount() ATTR(__const__);
00146 
00150     static const wxString&  GetDisplayName(enum EventType event) ATTR(__pure__);
00151 
00155     static bool     IsCoreCommandEnabled(enum EventType event) ATTR(__pure__);
00156 
00160     static bool     IsGUICommandEnabled(enum EventType event) ATTR(__pure__);
00161 
00162  private:
00163     // functions for CPreferences
00164     static const wxString&  GetKey(const unsigned int event) ATTR(__pure__);
00165     static bool&        GetCoreEnableVar(const unsigned int event) ATTR(__pure__);
00166     static wxString&    GetCoreCommandVar(const unsigned int event) ATTR(__pure__);
00167     static bool&        GetGUIEnableVar(const unsigned int event) ATTR(__pure__);
00168     static wxString&    GetGUICommandVar(const unsigned int event) ATTR(__pure__);
00169 };
00170 
00171 #undef USEREVENTS_EVENT
00172 
00173 #endif /* USEREVENTS_H */
